name: React.js
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces with reusable components and dynamic data handling.

name: Node.js
description: A server-side JavaScript runtime that allows building fast and scalable backend applications.

name: Express.js
description: A lightweight framework for Node.js used to create APIs and manage server-side routes and middleware.

name: MongoDB
description: A NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents for scalable backend solutions.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework used for rapidly designing responsive and modern user interfaces.

name: HTML
description: The standard markup language for structuring web page content and elements.

name: CSS
description: A stylesheet language used to style and layout web pages, including colors, spacing, and responsiveness.

name: JavaScript
description: A high-level programming language used to create interactive and dynamic web functionality.
